subH1: We need your help! We always need more volunteers to rehabilitate those adorable rescued orphans. Help save the rainforest â€” volunteer today!
h2: Volunteer today & live in the rainforest
subH2: Volunteer or just say hello using the form.
extraNotes: Volunteer duties: Cleaning bat and animal enclosures. Refilling water buckets. Feeding orphans or infant animals. Collecting foliage for enclosures. Cleaning food buckets. Chopping fruit and other food preparations. Giving informational talks to the public on open days.
addressSubH2: We're in Kuranda, find the top of the Jumrum walk, next to the fire station. BatReach is located at the bottom of the paved walkway.
